Posts.Content: Hi, I have the same. I started chemo in June with a 3 cm tumour. After 3 treatments I had an ultrasound and it had gotten "significantly smaller " according to the radiologist . My last chemo was at the start of October. I had another ultrasound on the 29thand it showed even more of a reduction in fact it is now measuring at 8mm. I am due an operation for a lumpectomy and lymph node removal in 2 weeks.
Posts.Title: Grade 3 6cm tumour shrinking on chemo - Invasive ductal carcinoma

Posts.Content: Hi, I finished chemotherapy on the 8th of October. I then had a scan on the 29th followed by another appointment with my surgeon. My operation is on the 25th of November.
